DOC.brief_summary: Research study determine relationship perineural catheter tip location relative sciatic nerve bifurcation postoperative analgesia continuous popliteal nerve block .
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Popliteal Nerve Blocks : Effect Perineural Catheter Tip Location Relative Sciatic Nerve Bifurcation Postoperative Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : During continuous popliteal nerve block , postoperative analgesia improve perineural catheter tip level sciatic nerve bifurcation compare catheter tip 5 cm cephalad/proximal bifurcation .
